data.eml:eml: SPC PROCFish/C Fish Observations New Caledonia 2004

Coastal fish species of commercial interest observed on Underwater Visual Census transects in New Caledonia during the PROCFish/C surveys (2004) in 5 sites Moindou, Luengoni, Oundjo, Thio, Ouassé. The individual counts correspond to the observations by a single diver (one side) on the 50 m transect, from the transect line up to visibility (distance sampling).
